products.title: Devonshire, Light Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: Ideal for creating a contemporary look in any room, the devonshire in light grey is formed from an array of white and stormy grey threads for a distinctive looking blind with a subtle texture and a modern, washed denim finish. Form a soothing and rejuvenating base of white and dove grey for a modern palette in your home office, framing the light grey with pale yet heavy linens. Incorporate darker tweeds and other rustic fabrics for a current and contrasting theme with a comforting, country twist.

products.title: Devonshire, Stone - Roman Blind
products.description: Produce an simple and elegant look with the devonshire in stone, where a blend of fine, creamy threads merge to form a sophisticated blind with a graceful and relaxed fall, and in a contemporary, pale grey hue. For a modern decor scheme with a cool and fresh vibe, blend the stone with mushroom, dove grey, and charcoal shades, layering with alike textured fabrics and contrasting linens to form a classy finish with current style and comfort.

products.title: Devonshire, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: Create a welcoming and contemporary look with the devonshire in charcoal grey, which showcases a distinctive style with its delicate texture and modern, washed denim effect in a neat weave of dove grey and slate threads. Highlight the stylish charcoal by placing it against contrasting white walls and subdued grey linens, forming a modern and charismatic look. Complement the deep grey shade by matching with soft furnishings and features in similar stormy hues, and accent with a bolder colour of your choice, such as fuschia or lime.
